We have a very special offer for you today. HostingBox is a newly launched brand. We encourage your feedback as it will help us grow. HostingBox specializes in Shared/Reseller, VPS, and Dedicated Hosting. Our goal is to offer high quality products at a low end cost.  
   
What are these resource pools? With these you are assigned a certain set of resources and you are allowed to create, scale, and destroy servers on demand.   
   

            
**Black Friday 6GB (OpenVZ)**

   * 150 GB Storage _(Free 50GB Upgrade!)_  
   * 4TB Bandwidth _(Free 1TB Upgrade!)_  
   * 6 vCores  
   * 6 IPv4  
   * Free 20Gbps DDoS protection in Dallas, TX  
    
$18/quarter
